casebody.data:
No. 11-102. National Petrochemical and Refiners Association and American Petroleum Institute, Petitioners v. Environmental Protection Agency, et al. 565 U.S. 1014, 132 S. Ct. 571,

181 L. Ed. 2d 396,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 7950. November 7, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.

Same case below, 394 U.S. App. D.C. 1, 630 F.3d 145.
